Your goals are:
- Identify which objects are blickets.
- Infer the underlying rule for how the machine turns on.

  take ... off ...:    take an object off the machine
  exit:                exit the game

- All objects can be either on the machine or on the floor.
- You should think about how to efficiently explore the relationship between the objects and the machine.

You will be prompted at each turn to choose actions.

3. Later tests showed:

- Object 3 is definitely a blicket
- The rule might be "machine turns on when exactly one blicket is present" (since when both 0 and 3 were on, it stayed on)
- Or it might be "machine turns on when any blicket is present"

To confirm, I should test object 3 alone again and see if other objects can turn it on alone.

> put object 3 on the machine
